Banner.Description: I have 7 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, implements, and technological solutions for retail stores. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, .NET Core, ASP .NET and sometimes in Python .
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a deployment staff and 4 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with NET. Core, ASP .NET, Angular, indexedDB and SQL Server. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing codes, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Development vice manager
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Node.js, and SQLServer, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support multiple applications, using .NET Core.
Built notification API using WebSockets (SignalR), increasing communication and collaboration among clients.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Leading a team of 4 people in the development and maintain using C#, Winform, SQL Server and team of 2 in development new product using NET Core, Angular, NodeJS, SQL Server.
Report progress of projects to Director.

Experience.Jobs.Title: R&D team leader
Description: Research technology required by manager for new product .
Design source code pattern for new product.
Checking code from member, assure consistency and logic

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Deployment for Co.opFood franchise
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Interface data from master system, deploy POS product, design and build mechanism to ensure interface data.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Deployment for GS25 VietNam Convenient Store
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Workshop with Korean GS25 team to select software features, record requirement specific for 24h model. Test features after development.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Reporting Tool
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Develop web for design and view summary reports base on Devexpress Dashboard and SQL Server along with OLAP in order for reports to be multidimensional and throughout time

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: TOPOS new version
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Design new UI base on WPF of Microsoft.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Face recognition web
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Develop web using Python and InfluxDB with NCS2 of Intel to recognize loyalty customer, along with customer's gender and age through camera.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: TOPOS Go
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Develop POS webapp on mobile device using Angular and SPA ensure operate in many networks occasions.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Zalo Integrated Notification
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Develop API and window service excute summarize end of day sale data or base on Zalo action to send reports by text or pdf file to user.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Payment Gateway
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Develop API for POS clients connect online payment: GrabPay, ZaloPay, ShopeePay, VNPay, Momo and online Voucher: GotIt, Urbox.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Covid Tracker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Covid Tracker is a web app which is built using the 3rd Party Api integration. This app shows the records from worldwise and countrywise that shows the who much patient are suffer from covid who many died from covid and how many are recoverd from covid

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Lets Chat
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A real-time chat application. Another fun side project :)

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Quiz App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page quiz app that has a minimal design, that has different level to attempt quizes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: JWT Integration
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: JWT AUTHENTICATION IN NODE JS WITH POSTGREESQL DB

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
